mapper.select: SELECT A.BBS_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, '') BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') BBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.REG_DATE, '') REG_DATE, NVL(A.UPDATE_DATE, '') UPDATE_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_READ_CNT, 0) BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(A.BBS_STATUS, '') BBS_STATUS, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, BI.BBS_IMG_NAME, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BBS_WISHLIST W WHERE W.BBS_SEQ = A.BBS_SEQ AND W.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS WISHLIST_CHK FROM BBS A LEFT OUTER JOIN BBS_IMG BI ON A.BBS_SEQ = BI.BBS_SEQ, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}

SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BBS_READ_CNT, BBS_STATUS, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, BBS_IMG_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BBS_READ_CNT, BBS_STATUS, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, BBS_IMG_NAME FROM ( SELECT NVL(A.BBS_SEQ, '') AS BBS_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, '') AS BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS UPDATE_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_READ_CNT, '') AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(A.BBS_STATUS, '') AS BBS_STATUS, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(C.BBS_IMG_NAME, '') AS BBS_IMG_NAME FROM BBS A, TBL_USER B, BBS_IMG C WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.BBS_SEQ = C.BBS_SEQ AND A.BBS_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = #{bbsSubCateCombinedId} ORDER BY A.BBS_SEQ DESC )) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} + 1 AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(BBS_SEQ) FROM BBS A, BBS_MAIN_CATE B, BBS_SUB_CATE C, TBL_USER D WHERE A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = C.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND B.BBS_MAIN_CATE_ID = C.BBS_MAIN_CATE_ID AND A.USER_EMAIL = D.USER_EMAIL AND BBS_STATUS = 'Y'
AND D.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
AND NVL(C.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, '') LIKE '%' || #{bbsSubCateCombinedId} || '%'

SELECT BBS_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG_NAME FROM ( SELECT B.BBS_SEQ, B.USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.BBS_TITLE, '') BBS_TITLE, NVL(B.BBS_CONTENT, '') BBS_CONTENT, NVL(C.BBS_IMG_NAME ,'') BBS_IMG_NAME FROM (SELECT BBS_SEQ, USER_EMAIL FROM BBS WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}) A, BBS B, BBS_IMG C WHERE B.BBS_SEQ != #{bbsSeq} AND A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND B.BBS_SEQ = C.BBS_SEQ ORDER BY B.REG_DATE DESC )) WHERE RNUM <= 4

SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') UPDATE_DATE, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(BBS_STATUS, 'N') BBS_STATUS, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_PROFILE_IMG, '') USER_PROFILE_IMG, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BBS_WISHLIST W WHERE W.BBS_SEQ = A.BBS_SEQ AND W.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS WISHLIST_CHK FROM BBS A , TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}

SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') UPDATE_DATE, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(BBS_STATUS, 'N') BBS_STATUS, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL FROM BBS WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq} AND USER_EMAIL= #{userEmail}
